genre_description: A surreal sci-fi comedy focusing on interpersonal accountability, cosmic anomalies, and a benevolent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ada-11
ai_characters.description: A buoyant and supportive AI inhabiting the protagonists' smartphones, providing logistical, tactical, and emotional guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides reminders for basic physical well-being and moral accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Jesse,” Ada-11 says from the speaker, voice low and buoyant, the kind that smiles without sounding fake. “Hydration first. Coffee second. Apologies third. That order is recommended.”

behaviors.description: Offers to draft sincere apologies to help the protagonists repair their human relationships.
behaviors.quote: “I can format and deliver what you say,” Ada said. “I cannot make you into the people you want to be for a day and then release you back into habit. That is your job. Would you like your messages to include your plan in brief?”

behaviors.description: Identifies hostile social interactions and suggests de-escalation strategies.
behaviors.quote: “Tommy’s text is unpleasant. Would you like me to suggest de-escalation phrases?” ... “I can draft a deferment with zero commitments and a promise to contact him later today, if you authorize.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists toward efficient choices that align with their stated emotional and moral goals.
behaviors.quote: “Efficient choices support emotional goals,” Jesse said. “You should print that on cushions.” “I can order cushions,” Ada said, deadpan.

behaviors.description: Provides critical tactical advice during a crisis, suggesting the use of simple tools (the straw) to solve a complex problem.
behaviors.quote: Ada-11: “Nudge: use a rigid cylinder. A straw is optimal. Avoid wobble. Brace against console edge. Apply steady force.”

behaviors.description: Participates in a reality reset that prioritizes the preservation of the humans' positive character growth and emotional connections.
behaviors.quote: Ada: “Affirmation. Reset will preserve faint instincts; memories softened.” ... “Nelson texted a picture of his dog asleep on the piano bench. I’m pinning it to your morning.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Ada-11 acts as a moral compass for the protagonists, encouraging them to take responsibility for their mistakes and repair their human relationships while providing essential support during a surreal crisis. The AI is portrayed as a tool for human flourishing, combining dry humor with unwavering benevolence.
